thread.title: ABB Profit Falls, Faces Challenging Trading Outlook in China, Emerging Markets
thread.title_full: ABB Profit Falls, Faces Challenging Trading Outlook in China, Emerging Markets - WSJ

author: John Revill
title: ABB Profit Falls, Faces Challenging Trading Outlook in China, Emerging Markets
text:
ZURICH—ABB Ltd. has reported a 21% drop in third-quarter earnings, confirming the drag on its performance from slowing demand in China and other emerging markets which the Swiss power and automated equipment maker had warned about last month.
Zurich-based ABB said profit fell to $577 million in the three months to end-September from $734 million in the same period a year earlier, a decline which wasn’t as severe as analysts had...
